Name: Para Bellum - Hold the Line
About the game: Para Bellum - Hold the Line is a 3D real time small unit tactics game. Your task is to hold off enemy attacks wave after wave using a variety of different Units and Supports in your arsenal to the best of your abilities in Campaign and Skirmish modes. UNITS Deploy and order a multitude of different Units including Riflemen, Medics, Machinegunners and Anti-Vehicle Infantry. SUPPORTS Turn the tide of the battle by calling in support in the forms of Mortar or Air Strikes, Supply Drops and more. CAMPAIGN Complete a campaign of 15 unique missions. Units that survive a battle will gain experience and accompany you to your next mission, but be aware - if they get killed, they're lost forever! PLATOON Customize your Platoon by requesting new types of Units and Supports. This will help you gain the upper hand in the battlefield. SKIRMISH Skirmish mode allows you to play any of the game's maps with customizable settings.
